name: Elijah Wood
summary:
Elijah Wood. Actor: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring. Elijah Wood is an American actor best known for portraying Frodo Baggins in Peter Jackson's blockbuster Lord of the Rings film trilogy. In addition to reprising the role in The Hobbit series, Wood also played Ryan in the FX television comedy Wilfred (2011) and voiced Beck in the Disney XD animated television series Tron: Uprising (2012).

Born Elijah...
